h1. Creating or Editing a Vendor

When creating an Vendor the following screen will appear.

!PLUGINS_ROOT/com.netxforge.netxstudio.help/img/tasks/library/vendors/creating_a_vendor.png!

The following data should be entered 

* The vendor name
* The vendor short name
* The vendor websie

*Cancel* => Click on the 'Back' link at the bottom of the screen.
*Save* => Click on the 'Save link at the bottom of the screen.
